intro: Dendrobium macrophyllum var. veitchianum, commonly known as the Veitch's large-leaf orchid, is a tropical orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is an epiphytic plant that grows on trees, using its aerial roots to absorb moisture and nutrients from the air. The plant features long, cane-like stems that produce clusters of fragrant, showy flowers in shades of white, pink, and yellow.
